Class DigitTotal

  • java.lang.Object
    • DigitTotal

  • public class DigitTotal
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Zsolt Pazmandy 1600690 Computer Science MSc 2015/16 Software Workshop Worksheet 2: Exercise 2 The program performs calculations with individual digits of numbers entered, such as calculating the sum of the individual digits of any number entered, or calculating which digit occurs most frequently or determining how proportionally frequent a certain digit is in an entered number
